extension.name: CDN Tax Receipts
extension.description: Creates Tax Receipts that are CRA compliant: including single or annual/aggregate tax receipts, with distribution by email or print, detailed reporting, press ready PDF template possible
extension.comments: Developed as a collaboration between Karin Gerritsen (semper-it.com), Lola Slade (freeform.ca), Alan Dixon (blackflysolutions.ca) and Jake Martin White (peaceworks.ca)
